mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrLoginLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , MBR_LOGIN_CD , LOG_OCCUR_DT , LOGIN_IP , LOGIN_NATION_CD , INFLOW_URL , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , OS_CD , MOBILE_APP_SECT_CD , INFLOW_SN , LOGIN_MDUL_SECT_CD , LOGIN_FAILR_PW , UTID FROM MBR_LOGIN_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrLoginLog Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_LOGIN_LOG WHERE 1 = 1
